objectives.hint: Subdue the Champion Timber Wolf during "Engage the wolf pack leader"event.
objectives.name: Received a report about a rather large, hostile wolf in the caves near Moon Camp.

objectives.hint: Kill the Champion Invasive Iboga during "Defeat the invasive iboga"event.
objectives.name: Received a report about a large and hostile iboga south of Moon Camp.

objectives.hint: Defeat the Mushroom King, which appears after completing "Forage and taste test for edible mushrooms" event.
objectives.name: Received a report about a group being ambushed by a large mushroom while gathering mushrooms in the Bjorn Thicket.

objectives.hint: Slay the Champion Rampaging Warg during "Hunt down the rampaging warg" event.
objectives.name: Received a report about a large warg rampaging through Lupine Fields.

objectives.hint: Defeat the Champion Valravn Knight at the end of "Escort Ardent Gale as she poisons valravn nests"event, north of Timberland Holt.
objectives.name: Received a report of valravn at the cliffs near Lupine Fields.
